lead_paragraph: The wife of embattled French presidential candidate Francois Fillon said in an interview on Sunday that the work she had carried out for him was real and that she wanted him to continue his campaign until the end.
snippet: The wife of embattled French presidential candidate Francois Fillon said in an interview on Sunday that the work she had carried out for him was real and that she wanted him to continue his campaign until the end....

headline.main: French Presidential Candidate Fillon's Wife Says He Should Battle On
headline.print_headline: French Presidential Candidate Fillon's Wife Says He Should Battle On
